attributes.action: Reinstate Boris Johnson at prime minister of the United Kingdom .
attributes.additional_details: Because with out him you are even more useless.
attributes.background: We want the Government to reinstate Boris Johnson as the leader of the Conservative party and to become our prime minister.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
